title: Mathieu van der Poel Builds Toward the Tour de France … on the Mountain Bike
content:
MVDP makes long-awaited return to cross country this weekend in Nové Město in build toward world title dream in September. Oh, and he's racing the Tour before that, too.

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel Builds Toward the Tour de France … on the Mountain Bike on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
